Dialogue.Value: The Storage Room door,is locked.
It’s the door to the,Multi-Purpose Room.
I’ve never seen this room used,since I started school here.
Hey! Where do you think,you’re going!?,You have to go to class!
You still have things to do,before going home，don’t you!?
I can’t just leave Shanghai,behind!
Aw，man...
I have to go into the,Storage Room，but the,teacher isn’t here yet.
Oh，the classroom is,in the other hall?
Do you know about Sub Chips?
They have many useful effects，,like recovering HP or avoiding,viruses.
But unlike Battle Chips，you,can only use them once.
You should buy some when,you get the chance!
Just make sure you have,enough Sub Memory to,carry them all!
Go ahead and jack in，Alice!
The Storage Room door,should be on the same,network we were just in!
Let’s put a stop to this incident!
You go restart the computer!,Leave the network to us!
I could enter the PC Room，,but I need to go to class!
A dangerous high-voltage,current is flowing through,the door!
I could enter the PC Room，,but I need to go to class!
A dangerous high-voltage,current is flowing through,the door!
This card reader authorizes,entry into the Storage Room.
It has a jack in port，but I need,permission before I can use it.
This card reader authorizes,entry into the Storage Room.
I can jack in!
We’re getting a new trainee,teacher next month.
I wonder what kind of person,they’ll be?,I’m looking forward to it.
